parameter.name: email
parameter.label: User Name
parameter.description: The email to use when connecting to an Efergy Engage account

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: The password to use when connecting to an Efergy Engage account

parameter.name: device
parameter.label: Registered device name
parameter.description: The name of the device registered with Efergy mobile app. e.g. "android"

parameter.name: utcOffset
parameter.label: Offset to UTC
parameter.description: Specifies the UTC offset in minutes for total calculations. A value of -120 means current time zone of UTC+2

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh refresh
parameter.description: Specifies the refresh refresh in seconds
